section_one.title: Curug Balong Endah
section_one.description: Balong Endah Waterfall is open to the public every day from 7 am to 5 pm. It's best if you come to visit when it's not the rainy season. That way, the volume of the waterfall will be more stable and the water will tend to be clearer.
section_one.address: Kawasan Wisata Gunung Salak Endah Pasir Lenyit, Jl. Curug Pangeran, Kec. Pamijahan, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat 16810

section_one.title: Bukit Diponegoro Hillside Park
section_one.description: Diponegoro Hill is one of the hidden gem tourist destinations in Semarang which is currently being sought after by young people in the city of Semarang. For those who want to unwind from the tiredness of activities, Diponegoro Hill is the right destination to visit. Here you will be presented with a stretch of green grass.
section_one.address: Taman Kota Diponegoro - Bukit Senja, Tembalang, Kota Semarang, Jawa Tengah 50275

section_one.title: Tugu Digulis
section_one.description: The Eleven Digulis Monument in West Kalimantan, also known as the Digulis Monument or the Sharp Bamboo Monument or the Untan Roundabout Monument by local residents, is a monument located at the Tanjungpura University Roundabout, Jalan Jend. Ahmad Yani, Bansir Laut Village, Southeast Pontianak District, Pontianak City
section_one.address: W8VX+VQ7, Jl. Jenderal Ahmad Yani, Bansir Laut, Kec. Pontianak Tenggara, Kota Pontianak, Kalimantan Barat 78115

section_two.title: Taman Nasional Gunung Palung
section_two.description: Gunung Palung National Park is a national park located in North Kayong Regency and Ketapang Regency, West Kalimantan
section_two.address: 4XJF+88Q, Padu Banjar, Kec. Simpang Hilir, Kabupaten Ketapang, Kalimantan Barat 78857

section_two.title: Kebun Raya Bogor
section_two.description: Bogor Botanical Gardens or Bogor Botanical Gardens is a large botanical garden located in Bogor City, Indonesia. This garden is operated by the National Research and Innovation Agency. This garden is located in the center of Bogor city and adjacent to the Bogor Palace presidential palace complex.
section_two.address: Jl. Rahadi Usman, Tengah, Kec. Pontianak

section_two.title: Saloka Park
section_two.description: SALOKA is present as one of the Pesona Indonesia tourist destinations in the form of a family thematic recreation park in Central Java which carries the concept of local wisdom. Located at the intersection between the cities of Semarang, Salatiga, Surakarta and the Special Region of Yogyakarta.
section_two.address: Jl. Fatmawati No.154, Gumuksari, Lopait, Kec. Tuntang, Kabupaten Semarang, Jawa Tengah 50773
